update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_POP_COL = I_POP_COL + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_POP_COL) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_UFUNC = I_UFUNC + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_UFUNC) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_HEADER set I_TXT = I_TXT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_ORIG set I_UE_ORIG = I_UE_ORIG + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_UE_ORIG) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_USED set I_USER_EXIT = I_USER_EXIT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_USER_EXIT) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_USED set I_INSTANCE = I_INSTANCE + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_INSTANCE) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_USED set I_TXT_VALUE = I_TXT_VALUE + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_VALUE) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_UFUNC = I_UFUNC + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_UFUNC) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_PROJECT = I_PROJECT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_PROJECT) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_TXT_DEF = I_TXT_DEF + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_DEF) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_TXT_DESC = I_TXT_DESC + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_DESC) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_IMPL set I_UFUNC_IMPL = I_UFUNC_IMPL + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_UFUNC_IMPL) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_IMPL set I_UFUNC = I_UFUNC + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_UFUNC) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_IMPL set I_TXT_IMPL = I_TXT_IMPL + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_IMPL) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_TECHNO set I_UFUNC_IMPL = I_UFUNC_IMPL + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_UFUNC_IMPL) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_USER_EXIT = I_USER_EXIT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_USER_EXIT) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_TRT = I_TRT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TRT) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_TXT_UE_HELP = I_TXT_UE_HELP + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_UE_HELP) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_TXT_VALUE = I_TXT_VALUE + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_VALUE) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_VAR set I_VAR = I_VAR + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_VAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_VAR set I_PROJECT = I_PROJECT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_PROJECT) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_VAR set I_TXT_VAR_IN = I_TXT_VAR_IN + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_VAR_IN) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_VAR set I_TXT_VAR = I_TXT_VAR + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_VAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_VAR set I_TXT_VAR_VAL_TXT = I_TXT_VAR_VAL_TXT + :NEWOFFSET where digits(I_TXT_VAR_VAL_TXT) like :OLDMASK
